title: out of range!?
body: So i took a 7 month break from league and when i came back every match i cannot play in full screen and it drives me nuts and riot wasnt able to help me and this is the only game that gives me this problem and its annoying cause i dont like to play in windowed or borderless i preffer to play in full is there a way to fix this or is this a bug on riots end in theyre files for the game?

replies.body: still havnt been able to fix this issue this is fustrating

This was an ongoing bug for a little while, but we released a fix for it in a recent patch. Since you're still seeing issues with this, I recommend reaching back out in your support ticket or by creating a [**new one**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We'll be able to get you in touch with a tech specialist again so we take a peek at your system logs and sort this out for good.

If you have any questions, let me know.
